channel.title: Medical Diagnosis on Validated Patterns
channel.description: Recent content in Medical Diagnosis on Validated Patterns

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Deploying the Medical Diagnosis pattern Prerequisites An OpenShift cluster To create an OpenShift cluster, go to the Red Hat Hybrid Cloud console.

item.title: Cluster Sizing
item.description: About OpenShift cluster sizing for the Medical Diagnosis pattern xlarge To understand cluster sizing requirements for the Medical Diagnosis pattern, consider the following components that the Medical Diagnosis pattern deploys on the datacenter or the hub OpenShift cluster:

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: Understanding the Makefile The Makefile is the entrypoint for the pattern. We use the Makefile to bootstrap the pattern to the cluster.

item.title: Ideas for customization
item.description: About customizing the pattern Medical Diagnosis pattern One of the major goals of the Validated Patterns development process is to create modular and customizable demos.

item.title: Demo Script
item.description: Introduction The medical diagnosis pattern integrates multiple Red Hat and Open Source technologies together to create an AI/ML workflow that is able to identify signs of pneumonia in x-ray images.
